name: Identities
description: Manage identities and identity data for users. Intended for internal use by modules exposing auth providers.

list.name: List Identities
list.description: List all identities the user is associated with.

fetch.name: Fetch Identity Data
fetch.description: Fetch the data associated with a specific identity for a user.

set.name: Set Identity Data
set.description: Set the data associated with a specific identity for a user.

sign_in.name: Sign In With Identity
sign_in.description: Sign in to a user with an identity.

sign_up.name: Sign Up With Identity
sign_up.description: Sign up with an identity. Creates a new user.

sign_in_or_sign_up.name: Sign In or Sign Up With Identity
sign_in_or_sign_up.description: Sign in to a user with an identity, creating a new user if it fails.

link.name: Link Identity To User
link.description: Link a new identity and its associated data to a user. This is used for login and non-login identities.

identity_provider_already_added.name: Identity Provider Already Added To User

identity_provider_already_used.name: Identity Provider Already Used By Other User
